content: For the Canonical URL I would have liked to use application.host.org/fhir but with MVC and having a fhir controller it was causing routing problem. Have anyone had this problem? I was thinking of using application.host.org/fhirHL7 just wanted to see what people used as alternated.
If that's .net did you know there is a facade library available?
Ask on the dotnet stream if you're interested.
this is for hosting the IG, I think
